Remove old code related to Python 2 from autogenerated interpreters. Also remove the include of the header file, since it is no longer generated by Cython.

CC:  @mkoeppe

Branch/Commit: **[`55358ef`](https://github.com/sagemath/sagetrac-mirror/commit/55358ef2f4af33927a58db81387e7da1dcd20a8a)**

``````diff
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1 +1 @@
-Remove old code related to Python 2 from autogenerated interpreters. 
+Remove old code related to Python 2 from autogenerated interpreters. Also remove the include of the header file, since it is no longer generated by Cython.
``````
